resources.string: The Unquestionify App used with this application is not installed on your ConnectIQ device. Please install the app and try again.
Unquestionify needs notification access permission to be able to read other App\'s notification. Click on \"Go to Settings\" and grant permission.
Select which applications can send notifications to watch
